main event: A civilian reported a sighting of a bright white object in the sky over Baudette, Minnesota on January 15, 1960.
interesting points: The object was reported to have characteristics of a familiar type, though not commonly seen., The observation lasted only one second., The sighting occurred at 0615 AM., The object was noted to be falling straight down and disappeared instantaneously., The witness was a 35-year-old who drove an oil truck for a local company.
witness description: Civilian, age 35, drives oil truck for Co-op Oil Company.
